text: Hay bao chung: “Cac nguoi co nhin thay nhung than linh cua cac nguoi ma cac nguoi cau nguyen ngoai Allah hay khong? Hay chi cho ta thay cai (vat) ma chung đa tao duoi đat? Hoac chung co phan hun hap nao tren cac tang troi hay khong? Hoac TA co ban cho chung Kinh Sach nho đo chung co đuoc bang chung ro ret hay khong? Khong. Nhung ke lam đieu sai quay chi hua hao voi nhau
